import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import React, { useState } from "react"; function AddGame() { const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()); const isWeekday = date => { const day = date.getDay(); return day !== 0 && day !== 6; }; return (
Add Game
Date* setStartDate(date)} filterDate={isWeekday} /> Home* Away* Comments
) }; export default AddGame;
